tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "05FC21824C0C14FDCD5910AAF1BC45AE", "You received Node Currency! This is rewarded for completing tasks that are beneficial to a node, such as mayoral commissions or buy orders. Speak to a Currency Vendor near the town hall of any Node to see their exclusive inventory.")
